Kent APIs
========

Kent APIs is a set of RESTful api endpoints useful to making projects that connect with the kent schedule system. It is built using node and NPM. If you would like to build it yourself::

    git clone https://github.com/dchao19/KentAPIs.git
    npm install
    npm start

Node.js and NPM should handle most of the dependency systems for you.

Features
--------

- User authentication for personalized results.
- Return current period/day_type
- Admin authentication for adding/removing special periods/day_types


Installation
------------
Install via npm.

Contribute
----------

- Issue Tracker: github.com/$project/$project/issues
- Source Code: github.com/$project/$project

Support
-------

If you are having issues, please let us know.
We have a mailing list located at: project@google-groups.com
